Articles.Content:
This is a repost of my question in add-on discussion

They are MASSIVE white rings around jool and some moons. This is my 1st  experience with anything modded, so I used can to install avp, and It works well, other than the massive rings withing the map and game around jool and its inner moons. there were no install errors nor crashing

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HWGdnu7-GdlqrUwLt3VJMMB-Njgvj2mp/view?usp=sharing

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LEkrFH_cR0sBds4IIjBohb_Mtg0-2agN/view?usp=sharing
Update, I have narrowed it down to  avp error, and everything else functions fine
